searchBadges.hpAbove: Pokémon HP base stat {value} or above
searchBadges.attackAbove: Pokémon Attack base stat {value} or above
searchBadges.defenseAbove: Pokémon Defense base stat {value} or above
searchBadges.spAttackAbove: Pokémon Sp.Atk base stat {value} or above
searchBadges.spDefenseAbove: Pokémon Sp.Def base stat {value} or above
searchBadges.speedAbove: Pokémon Speed base stat {value} or above
searchBadges.totalAbove: Pokémon total base stats {value} or above

notes.multiCondition: You can search for Pokémon that meet multiple conditions simultaneously
notes.shinyStats: Check 'Show Shiny Stats' to display base stats with shiny bonuses
notes.advancedSearch: Expand advanced search to input more conditions
notes.multiMoves: Multiple moves can be selected; only Pokémon that can learn all selected moves will be shown
notes.singleAbility: Only one ability can be selected; only Pokémon with that ability will be shown
notes.multiTypes: 1-2 types can be selected; only Pokémon with all selected types will be shown
notes.statFilter: You can also find Pokémon with specific base stats above certain values
notes.sortByStats: Click on base stat headers to sort

timepiece.title: Timepiece
timepiece.ogDescription: The timepiece is a tool that can help you to know the game time, the time to open or close the event, the time to change the day or night. It also provides the countdown function.

guild.title: Guild War Pokémon Distribution
guild.ogDescription: This is a Pokémon distribution table for guild war.

move.title: Moves
move.description: You can search for the moves that a specific Pokémon can learn, or you can search for the Pokémon that can learn a specific move.
move.ogDescription: You can search for the moves that a specific Pokémon can learn, or you can search for the Pokémon that can learn a specific move.

gradeCard.title: Grade Card
gradeCard.description: You can search for the cards required for a specific Pokémon to upgrade, or you can search for the Pokémon that require a specific card.
gradeCard.ogDescription: You can search for the cards required for a specific Pokémon to upgrade, or you can search for the Pokémon that require a specific card.
gradeCard.pokemonRequire: Pokémons that require this card to upgrade

radar.title: Pokémon Radar
radar.ogDescription: This is a Pokémon radar, you can quickly find the location of Pokémon appearances.

instructions.intro: Includes Pokémon found in various maps, quickly find the Pokémon you want to catch, a must-have artifact for opening the Pokédex and catching Pokémon!!
instructions.searchPokemon: Can search for Pokémon names, e.g., Lucario.
instructions.searchArea: Can search for map names, e.g., Mt. Silver.
instructions.selectType: Can select Pokémon types, e.g., Dragon
instructions.evolveSearch: Contain evolve: Search for Pokémon in the same evolutionary line, e.g., entering Charizard can find Charmander
instructions.selectScope: Can select the search scope according to your needs

rebirth.potentialResult: Based on your current Rebirth Plate, your Pokémon's potential is

特攻套餐.name: SP.Attack Package
特攻套餐.description: Package for special attack type pets!

物攻套餐.name: Attack Package
物攻套餐.description: Package for physical attack type pets!

土豪套餐.name: Tycoon Package
土豪套餐.description: I have too many excellent gems!

我就廢.name: I'm Useless
我就廢.description: I'm useless, just need to be rebirth, stats don't matter!

疾速套餐.name: Speedy Package
疾速套餐.description: Only need speed, no need attack!

減速物攻套餐.name: Attack only Package
減速物攻套餐.description: Only need attack, no need sp.attack and speed!

減速特攻套餐.name: SP.Attack only Package
減速特攻套餐.description: Only need sp.attack, no need attack and speed!

一般方案(血量起手).name: General Plan (HP Start)
一般方案(血量起手).description: Well... everyone does it this way, just follow it, use more common DEF gems (9)

一般方案(特防起手).name: General Package (SP.DEF Start)
一般方案(特防起手).description: Well... everyone does it this way, just follow it, use more common HP gems (9)

一般方案(物防起手).name: General Package (DEF Start)
一般方案(物防起手).description: Well... everyone does it this way, just follow it, use more common SP.DEF gems (9)

省極好寶石方案(1血量極好).name: Save Excellent Gem Package (1 Excellent HP)
省極好寶石方案(1血量極好).description: What if you can't get excellent gems... only use 1 excellent HP gem!

省極好寶石方案(1特防極好).name: Save Excellent Gem Package (1 Excellent SP.DEF)
省極好寶石方案(1特防極好).description: What if you can't get excellent gems... only use 1 excellent SP.DEF gem!

省極好寶石方案(1物防極好).description: What if you can't get excellent gems... only use 1 excellent DEF gem!

about.title: About
about.ogDescription: This is a Pokémon related website, providing various Pokémon related information.
